name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Introduction to Web Development
description: Foundational concepts of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics.

lessons.name: Basics of HTML
lessons.description: Introduction to HTML elements, structure, and semantics.

lessons.name: Styling with CSS
lessons.description: Fundamentals of CSS for website styling.

lessons.name: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.description: Basic programming concepts in JavaScript for dynamic content.

name: Advanced Web Development
description: Advanced topics in web development, including frameworks, SPA, and server-side programming.

lessons.name: Frameworks and Libraries
lessons.description: Overview of popular JavaScript frameworks and libraries.

lessons.name: Single Page Applications (SPA)
lessons.description: Design and development of SPA using modern frameworks.

lessons.name: Server-side Programming
lessons.description: Introduction to server-side programming and databases.

description: Core principles of database management systems and SQL.

lessons.description: Basics of database systems and data models.

lessons.name: SQL and Database Design
lessons.description: Fundamentals of SQL queries and relational database design.

lessons.name: Normalization
lessons.description: Understanding normalization and database schemas.

name: NoSQL and Big Data
description: Exploration of NoSQL databases and big data technologies.

lessons.name: Introduction to NoSQL
lessons.description: Overview of NoSQL databases and use cases.

lessons.name: Big Data Technologies
lessons.description: Introduction to big data concepts and the Hadoop ecosystem.

lessons.name: Data Warehousing
lessons.description: Concepts of data warehousing and business intelligence.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Basic algorithmic techniques and complexity analysis.

lessons.name: Complexity Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding time and space complexity.

lessons.name: Basic Algorithms

description: In-depth study of data structures and advanced algorithmic strategies.

lessons.name: Dynamic Programming

lessons.name: Graph Algorithms
